Module io.jstach.rainbowgum
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum

Class LogConfig.Builder

java.lang.Object
io.jstach.rainbowgum.LevelResolver.AbstractBuilder<LogConfig.Builder>
io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig.Builder
Enclosing interface:
LogConfig
public static final class LogConfig.Builder extends LevelResolver.AbstractBuilder<LogConfig.Builder>
Builder for LogConfig.

NOTE: The service loader is not used by default with this builder. If the automatic discovery of components is desired call serviceLoader(ServiceLoader).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    LogConfig
    build()
    Builds LogConfig which will use the ServiceLoader if set to load missing components and if not set will use static defaults.

    • serviceLoader

      public LogConfig.Builder serviceLoader()
      Sets a default service loader to use for loading components that were not set. This call will just call the ServiceLoader without providing a class loader.
      Returns:
      this.

    • build

      public LogConfig build()
